= Introduction =

A quick howto on compiling and installing rtorrent, libtorrent and xmlrpc-c.

This guide expects that your system has all the installed dependencies for compiling theese sources, therefore i have not included such installation steps.

= Downloading =

Open up your favorite internet browser and point it to:
 * http://libtorrent.rakshasa.no/
 * http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=16847

download the source files, like so.
{{{
root@netbox:~# cd /usr/src/
root@netbox:/usr/src# wget http://surfnet.dl.sourceforge.net/sourceforge/xmlrpc-c/xmlrpc-c-1.11.00.tgz
root@netbox:/usr/src# wget http://libtorrent.rakshasa.no/downloads/libtorrent-0.11.8.tar.gz
root@netbox:/usr/src# wget http://libtorrent.rakshasa.no/downloads/rtorrent-0.7.8.tar.gz
}}}

(Alternative, svn version of rtorrent/libtorrent) ,,Preferred, see final notes.,,
{{{
root@netbox:/usr/src# svn co svn://rakshasa.no/libtorrent/trunk/rtorrent rtorrent
root@netbox:/usr/src# svn co svn://rakshasa.no/libtorrent/trunk/libtorrent libtorrent
}}}

now unpack the sources.

{{{
root@netbox:/usr/src# tar xzvf libtorrent*
root@netbox:/usr/src# tar xzvf rtorrent*
root@netbox:/usr/src# tar xzvf xmlrpc-c*
}}}


= Compiling and installing =
==libtorrent==
{{{
root@netbox:/usr/src# cd libtorrent-0.11.8/
# if you have the svn version you need to issue "sh autogen.sh" to generate the configure file.
root@netbox:/usr/src/libtorrent-0.11.8# ./configure 
root@netbox:/usr/src/libtorrent-0.11.8# make
root@netbox:/usr/src/libtorrent-0.11.8# make install
}}}



Congratulations, you are done with libtorrent. now lets move on with xmlrpc-c.

==xmlrpc-c==
{{{
root@netbox:/usr/src/libtorrent-0.11.8# cd ../xmlrpc-c-1.11.00/
root@netbox:/usr/src/xmlrpc-c-1.11.00# ./configure --disable-cplusplus
root@netbox:/usr/src/xmlrpc-c-1.11.00# make
root@netbox:/usr/src/xmlrpc-c-1.11.00# make install
}}}

This is going great! now lets move on to the final piece of the puzzle.

==rtorrent==
{{{
root@netbox:/usr/src/xmlrpc-c-1.11.00# cd ../rtorrent-0.7.8/
# if you have the svn version you need to issue "sh autogen.sh" to generate the configure file.
root@netbox:/usr/src/rtorrent-0.7.8# ./configure --with-xmlrpc-c
# if you get no package 'libtorrent' found, you might need something like this:
# PKG_CONFIG_PATH="/usr/local/lib/pkgconfig" ./configure --with-xmlrpc-c
root@netbox:/usr/src/rtorrent-0.7.8# make
root@netbox:/usr/src/rtorrent-0.7.8# make install
}}}

Put this in your ~/.rtorrent.rc:
{{{
# This will set rtorrent/scgi to listen on localhost, port 5000.
scgi_port = 127.0.0.1:5000
}}}

Looks like we made it!

you can now continue with StartingNtorrent

= Final notes =

For more information on configuring rtorrent with xmlrpc take a look at http://libtorrent.rakshasa.no/wiki/RTorrentXMLRPCGuide

,,* svn version might be preferred as rtorrent-0.7.8 source distribution has quite a few bugs,,
